docs.lead_paragraph: I spent last night's Republican debate trying to imagine scenarios where Mitt Romney loses the G.O.P. nomination for president. Rick Perry gets bitten by a radioactive Lincoln-Douglas debate champion and develops a sudden facility for public argument? A long-lost codicil to the Constitution is discovered, in which the Founding Fathers endorse the 9-9-9 tax plan? Utah renames itself the Republic of Deseret and secedes from the Union, forcing Romney to make a tragic choice between his religion and his country? Or, perhaps most unlikely of all - Jon Huntsman is embraced by the Tea Party and pulls off a surprise upset in Iowa?
docs.abstract: The Republican debates have turned into a kind of spring training for the frontrunner.
docs.snippet: The Republican debates have turned into a kind of spring training for the frontrunner.

headline.main: Data Reveals Wide Variation in Dental Fees

docs.abstract: Dental fees vary widely even in the same geographic area, an analysis finds.
docs.snippet: Dental fees vary widely even in the same geographic area, an analysis finds.

docs.lead_paragraph: Consumers could save significant money on dental care by simply shopping around and asking about prices in their own communities, an analysis of health claims data shows.

headline.main: Two Guns, 11 Bullets and a Jury Threading a Needle

docs.abstract: The Day: The jury in the trial of Barbara Sheehan found no incompatibility in sanctioning the battered-woman defense but not accepting that it took 2 guns and 11 bullets to make her feel safe. Also, what City Room is reading in other newspapers and blogs.
docs.snippet: The Day: The jury in the trial of Barbara Sheehan found no incompatibility in sanctioning the battered-woman defense but not accepting that it took 2 guns and 11 bullets to make her feel safe. Also, what City Room is reading in other newspapers and...

docs.lead_paragraph: In the 1991 film "Regarding Henry," Harrison Ford plays a total sleazoid who survives being shot in the head after he stumbles upon a store robbery. Before his misfortune, Mr. Ford's Henry Turner was despicable, a thorough bully at home and in his work. As he slowly recovers from his wounds, relearning to walk and talk, he becomes a man transformed. He is now caring and affectionate.

docs.abstract: Venture for America's goal is to staff start-ups, train entrepreneurs - and create 100,000 jobs by 2025.

docs.lead_paragraph: Each spring, well-heeled recruiters from financial and consulting firms lay siege to college campuses. They wine and dine the best and brightest students, siphoning future leaders off the top of the talent pool.

docs.abstract: Two opposing blogs document the complaints of those who object to the concentration of wealth and those who object to people who don't pay income taxes.

docs.lead_paragraph: Welfare. Food stamps. Bankruptcy and minimum wage. Those are a few of the complaints of those in We Are the 99 Percent, a Tumblr blog recording the stories of those who sympathize with the Occupy Wall Street protests.
